content.detailedDescription: My sister walked in the house in a panic saying she had just seen a ufo.  i was 15 years old and very skeptical of her story so i told her to takhoe me out and show me.  we drove around for about an hour with no luck so we were heading home.  within a quarter mile of our house we spotted an enormous circular object hovering no more than 200 feet over the road in the exact spot she said to have seen it an hour earlier.  she drove her car directly under the craft and stopped.  we were in total shock and amazement as we stared up through her t-tops at this silent but incredibly bright circular object hovering over us.  it had every color imaginable on it and was huge.  i would estimate 500 feet across.  we were very scared and after a minute or so i was so hysterical i begged her to get us out of there.  we sped away and did not see the craft leave because honestly, we were too afraid to look back.  we then went home and called selfridge air base and reported our experience.  we also called the state police but were not treated as very credible.  this was by far the most amazing thing i have ever seen in my life and can say without a doubt that this craft was not of human engineering.  my sister and i are more than willing to take lie detector tests or do anything else to verify our story.  to this day we always say "if we had only had a camera."  this incident happened on ray center road between 28 mile rd. and 29 mile rd.
content.summary: My sister and i drove under it and stopped.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home on a dark road rimmed with trees, it was a clear cold winter night so there was thousands of stars above. i noticed the moon shining though the trees on the right side in front of me, and thought that was odd, i've seen the moon set earlier this night and i turned to look to the direction where the moon should be, there was nothing visible behind the trees so i turned back and the light behind the trees i just saw was also gone, that's strange i thought and kept walking, wondering what it could have been. 

about 50 meters further on the road i saw a bright green star, about the magnitude of venus when it's at it's brightest but there are no green stars and i am quite interested in astronomy and sure that was no planet. i stopped and stared at the thing thinking what in the world is that, the color made me think of the northern lights. about 2-3 seconds it stood perfectly still in the sky, just like a star and then it shot away to the south west leaving nothing but a green line for a split second. i walked the rest of the way home looking at the sky trying to see something more, but that was all. 

i'll attach an illustration of approximately where in sky these objects were. the moon that appeared to the north-east was suppose to be setting in the north-west far below the treelike at this time, and the moon doesn't just disappear. there was no sounds or anything unusual other then the sighting. it was -12���c, clear and a light wind from the north
content.summary: Bright moon-like light and a green star object shooting away.

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime during my sleep on that night, i was hit with a strong frisson of fear and the immediate impression that i said (to who, i have no idea) either 'don't take me' or 'don't leave me'.  immediately after that i felt, physically felt, firm but gentle pressure on both my biceps above my elbows, pushing me backwards onto my mattress and into my pillows.  at the exact same moment, i felt an overwhelming sense of peace and calm, and almost felt sad when the pressure ended.  i regained awareness that i was in my bed a short time later, and didn't feel any sense of fear or anxiety, just kept the calm, peaceful feeling.  my dog didn't seem to have been bothered by anything, and nothing looked out of place in my room.  but i was certain something had happened.

the next morning i awoke with an amazing sense of joy, purposefulness, and was incredibly energetic and productive at work.  the only odd thing was that i heard a ringing/buzzing in my right ear that lasted for days after.  but since then i've been a bit more attentive to the phenomenon, which has prompted a bit of a paradigm shift in my thinking.  something else occurred later that has me thinking perhaps we are going to be given the opportunity to meet these 'others', whoever they may be.  i'm going to try not to get too freaked and try to keep an open mind and heart.
content.summary: Strong impression of visitation

content.detailedDescription: Flagra de um ufo por uma equipe de reportagem, da rede recort de tv
content.summary: Flagra

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 7:30am on 02/12/2011, i saw a white/silver cylindrical object moving east by northeast in the sky above phelan at approximately 200 - 300 mph and low in the sky.  not sure of the altitude, but guessing 10,000 ft. it was much lower than the commercial or military planes in our area.  i called my wife out and she seen the same thing.  the front was not pointed like a typical airplane.  there were no wings. my wife said to her it appeared that there was a depression on the rear of the cylinder and behind that a small tail or rudder pointing upward. there were no markings, lights, landing gears, windows or other features that we could see. there was no contrail, vapor or noise. 
 right after my wife came outside a second, identical object became visible a bit south and behind the first in a "wing man" position.  this one was closer to us and only at a slight angle from where we stood so we could see underneath it to confirm there were no visible features on the underside.
 the two objects continued flying east by north east until they were out of site.
 i called the sheriff's office to ask if other people had reported anything odd in the area. dispatch said no but they would send someone out to take a report. 
 the sheriff that came out suggested it might be a drone and it's spotter plane, since we live near a flight testing area for general atomics.   we do not feel that the objects we seen were anything close to the test vehicles we have seen out here in the past.  they were much too large and the second object looked exactly like the first, not like the piper type planes that usually escort drones.
content.summary: 2 large cylindrical white/silver cylinders with no wings flying in daylight

content.detailedDescription:
I have read a few other reports on here about seeing a bright white light with a trail so i thought i would report what i saw the other night in michigan.

i have seen many things here in michigan and i know others who have too, but rarely do they get reported on here.  as an avid sky watcher (when you can see it not snowing), i have been watching a bright light in the western sky that looks like it changes color--it is not high enough to be a star--it may be a plant, but i am not sure, my daughter and i have both watched it and it often looks like it shape changes.  

i went out for a drive to try and get a better look at the "object"..But realized as i was trying to locate it, i either disappeared or moved out of the viewing area.

i continued my drive and as i was driving south on creyts road in lansing i looked out my driver's side window (facing east) and at that moment saw a bright white burst of light with a trail.  it was over before i finished saying, "what the heck was that..."  had my camera in my lap but didn't even have time to snap a photo.  

it appeared to be dropping down out of the sky, but could have been moving across the sky.  perception is difficult when you are looking up in the dark, night sky.  for a second i thought maybe it was a flare as it resembled what a flare might look like, but there was absolutely no reason why a flare would be in the area.  no plane or helicopter flying over.  this is a warehouse district. 

the light was high enough in the sky to not be anything on ground level that would have caused it.  

i have seen shooting stars before, which were very high in the sky and orange in color.  this was not like that.  this was a very bright white ball of light with a trail, and was much lower than an average "star".

there was a semi-truck driver in the lane next to me and may have witnessed it also, but don't know.
content.summary: Bright white light with trail

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10:15pm, 11 feb 2011, i was driving on hwy 295 south in virginia and as i approached the mile marker 33(approximately), i saw a stream of light go up into the air right in front of my eyes. at the peak of the streaming light, i noticed it was wider than the actual stream. within approximately 1.5 seconds, it was all over, and the entire streaming light had disappeared. i immediately thought to myself, was that a flare? however, flares don���t disappear they burn as the light falls to the ground. this beaming light appeared to come from the ground up into the air a fast speed and disappeared rapidly. the area were the streak of light came from was partially wooded, however, these are the trees that separate 295 n and 295 s. 

based on what i saw, it appeared that it may have been something moving so fast into the air, that it left a bright white streak and then it disapeared. this concludes what i saw at 10:15, 11 feb 2011. to protect my identity, i have utilized dummy information; however, im sure there are other means of figuring who i am. i wish to remain anonymous.
content.summary: A streaming light goes up into the and disapear right in front of my eyes

content.detailedDescription:
at the time of the event i was living in south atlanta, it was late afternoon about dusk. i was inside my house, my son came in and asked me to go to the backyard to see something unrelated to the event. as i followed him out, along the side of our house heading to the back i casually glanced at the sky.
 as i looked up i noticed a black triangular object of considerable size moving from roughly southwest to northeast, i can't give a good estimate of its size as there was no frame of reference. the object had a white circular light at each corner and was moving very slowly, its edges were clearly distinguishable against the darkening sky. i watched it cross over the trees for a moment, then resumed going to the back, then it struck me that the object was close, that it made no sound at all, and that a/c lights have a completely different pattern. i stopped in shock and looked back up just in time to watch it become obscured behind the trees. i was a flight deck fueler, then jet mechanic in the navy in the 80's and early 90's and this was unlike any aircraft i've ever seen. i was struck by the, for lack of a better term, wrongness of it. its flight path was straight and level but far too low for a fixed wing aircraft, a helo that low would have made a considerable amount of noise and it was clearly travelling against the wind(at least the wind at ground level) and was moving much quicker than the wind as this was a still evening.
 my first instinct was to dismiss what i had seen, it was just too strange. i tried to convince myself that i must have imagined it, or that it was a normal but misidentified object. it didn't work. i'm a pretty observant person, and not given to flights of fancy. i saw this object and it wasn't a standard type of aircraft, it was clearly under powered flight. i went back and found my son in the yard and looked at whatever he wanted me to see, then we went back inside. i at first decided to keep this to myself but quickly changed my mind and told my wife about it,and shortly thereafter i also confided in my best friend.
 about a week later, again walking to the back yard,on the opposite side of the house this time, i saw another object(i had gotten in the habit of scanning the sky at this point), the same shape, but larger. it was around the same time of day, the object was higher in the sky but approximately the same apparent size as before(therefore it must, because of the relative perspective have been larger). it was farther to the west than the previous object and moving at approximately the same speed.The second object had the same white lights at the corners, and a fourth in the center, and like the first made no sound at all.This time being slightly less shocked i sprinted to my friends door and yelled for him to come outside and see it, but by the time he got out it was already occluded by the trees.
 shortly thereafter i happened across a show about ufo's and realized that the object i saw looked like the objects seen in the spate of sightings in belgium a few years previously.I was, until these events, not really a believer.While i could consider intellectually that ufo's might exist i knew how odd perfectly ordinary objects could look in the sky. i had seen many cases of what i knew to be ordinary aircraft look remarkably different. i am absolutely certain what i saw was not any ordinary craft.I can't imagine that someone would test experimental craft over a major population center, both for security and safety reasons. i tried to find a more mundane explanation for what i saw, but i couldn't.
content.summary: Multiple sightings of a triangle shaped craft over metro atlanta

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting ��� approximately 9:00 pm, thursday, february 10, 2011 ��� ruidoso, nm

facing northeast under a clear cold early nighttime sky, i sighted a star like object (slightly larger than bright planet venus on a summer night) shimmering brightly and moving slowly in a general westerly direction.  after a few seconds, the object veered north and northeast and its light disappeared.  at this time i thought i was witnessing the landing lights of an aircraft coming in for a landing.  however, the lack of lights on the wings and tail was curious.  seconds later, the object reappeared farther west than where it disappeared.  and again, a few seconds later, it veered north and northeast and its light was extinguished.  it reappeared a second time, again further west, but shortly thereafter the tall pine trees obstructed my view.  throughout the episode i did not hear any sound emanating from the object. 

a few seconds later after i lost sight of the object, i observed a high flying plane high in the eastern sky moving in a westerly direction.  i felt that the aircraft was following, or tailing, the object that i saw.  

minutes later, a jet approached from the east (possibly from holloman air force base in alamogordo?) and flew overhead, again in the same westerly direction. 

i am a retired public school mathematics teacher...And i must admit that this is the first time i have ever witnessed such an unusual event.
content.summary: Disappearing/reappearing slow moving starlike object above ruidoso, nm

content.detailedDescription:
At about 7:00pm i got into my car to go to the store. i put my car in reverse (backing toward the north). i got halfway down my driveway, and was looking to my right (toward west) when i noticed what i first thought were fireworks in the air. i also had street lights in my view (orange) and i thought i was catching some weird optical illusion effect through the window. they were more closely grouped when i first spotted them, there were about 7-8 bright red lights just kind of suspended in no particular formation hovering at between 30-40 degrees. i actually stopped to figure it out.  it didnt seem right, i thought maybe it was glare, perhaps the reflection of the street lights behind me. i quickly realized it was not glare, so i turned off the car. i got out of the car and stared for about 5 seconds to make sure i was really seeing it, and i raced into my house to yell for my family.

i was gone for about 10-15 seconds total, and when i returned to the driveway the lights were still there, but had spread a bit further out. the were all red. some were brighter at times, but usually they had about the same intensity. they all moved slightly and calmly, no sharp turns or bolting off. but the all moved in different directions, at different times, in no particular formation or pattern. some up, down, or any other obscure direection they wanted. i would estimate that it took about the next 3 minutes from the time i got back into my driveway for them all to eventuially burn out one by one.

my wife, and both of my kids saw it. we were all very moved, we know we saw something special. we were just standing outside on the sidewalk watching the show. i tried to take a good picture but the street lights would not make it possible with my horrible camera phone. i managed to obtain one picture that i believe shows one of the orbs, i think the others are drowned out by the street light glare. this just happened, and i can't get through to the news. i hope someone else saw this, i would love to see a video or better picture.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7-8 bright red orbs danced about the west valley sky west of avondale and goodyear, az between 7:00- 7:05 pm

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived at southern maine beagle club at a few miniuts before 5 am on january 6thto run my two hounds i went in to the running grounds and let the dogs loose and walked out to the out building to start a fire in the wood stove .After i got a fire going i went out to check on the dogs .It was a cristal clear morning and the stars were out as i was looking to the south i saw a shooting star and folowed it across the sky when i saw a real bright light and said to my self what planet is that but as i was looking at it i saw it was to big and too close to be a star or planet as i watched it it began to move and i mean in a rapid right than to the left and up and down i am a privet pilot and never saw any thing move that fast or reverse direction that fast i judge it to have been moving about 30 to 50 miles in secs i was so taking by what i was seeing that i could not take my eyes off of it some time had passed maby 1/2 hour when to the south a plane came in to veiw the object then stoped moving turned in to a circle from a triangle and then dimed the plane passed under it by i would say 5 to 6 thousand feet when the plane was gon it changed back to a triangle and began to move again the object was at 170 dreges south i say that because i had a gps tracking coller on the dog and i looked at the compas to document it for my self then i wanted some one elst to know what i was seeing so i called a co woker *(name deleted--cms/sg) in south portland but he didnot awnser it was too early so i left him a message then i called my wife and told her what i was watching it remaind in the same quadrent moveing up down back and forth again a plane came it vew once again it changed shape and dimmed until the plane was gone then i remberd my cell phone had a camera so i took three photos of it the sun was rising and stars were faiding but it still remaind bright abuot 6:05 it began to asend strait up until it was gone
content.summary: A bright triangle with therr smaler lights on the points and it would change shape to a circle and dim

content.detailedDescription: Driving through the country in the middle of the night..We were getting close to a bright light that i thought my be a chopper but as we got closer i realized the object was in still motion..As we got about 100 yards from the object that was low as the tree tops we stopped and got out of the car and the ufo had no sound what so ever..It was so bright that the car was very.. bright inside..I bowed to the ground in the middle of the road on my knees and prayed to god to forgive me for everything because i was sure we were getting ready to die..We got back in the car and was driving toward it and it looked like a shooting star as it disapered..We only live about a mile from the siteing..After about 5 min. as we were still looking at the sky air force jets were flying every where...Maybe the air force picked it up on radar...I'll never forget that night..My friend is a witness to it..I almost flipped out all i could do is pray...
content.summary: Over 100 yards wide,,very bright,,not a bit of sound..
Strange mountain and mountains with doors in them.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working on a large 160 acre farm in pendleton county, ky. i had several duties. on this day in question i was eating lunch and a local friend stop bye to say that he had saw some hunters sneaking on to the property, i told him that i would let them get settled down and after my lunch i would go out and round them up. so i finished lunch got my gun and started walking down the fence row my plan was to cut into the woods and sneak up on them. i had been out there around 45 mins to an hour and as i was making my way though the woods suddenly something step out from behind a tree. i yelled friend or foe and point my gun at it. i couldn't believe my eyes there standing in front of me and my gun was a 3 and 1/2 foot tall gray being, suddenly i had the thought that it was talking to me though my mind, i had the felling that it was a young female and it was scared and telling me it was going to run up a little knoll, just then it took off running up that knoll. i followed it with my gun barrel as it reach the top of the hill there was a flash of light and a door way opened up out of no where. it was about 4 ft wide and probably 8 ft tall it was brightly light inside and i could see the little being standing in it, now it looked like it was wearing a tight black suit of some sort. suddenly out of the corner of my left eye, i see what looked like something was running toward me i wheeled around and right in front of me was a lizard like man about 5 to 6 ft tall and he was holding a long staff like thing in one hand, his face was more insect looking to me though, and it had dark blue eyes. again i caught the feeling that it was the little females father, or guard. okay i know this sound weird but just then to my right there was a 7ft or 8 ft brown hairy bigfoot creature just standing there. i didn't hear him speak but i did hear in my mind no! don't hurt him. just then the lizard looking one, looked right at me and his eyes changed right in front of me to a yellowish gold. i turn to run and when i did. i was just standing there in the dark in the woods, yes it was night time. i stood there in shock for a moment trying to collect myself. i looked around and i was alone. i started my walk out of there. back to the farm house, when i got back there was another farm hand that said where have you been we thought you got lost. i didn't say a thing. i come forth now, because i have tried to live with this for years, but recently i was watching tv the history channel show ancient aliens and saw something that looked like the lizard man on the tv.
it brought back memories of that day and i started having dreams again and thinking strange thoughts like, could that have be a portal i saw the little one go into? are they interdenominational? or time travelers?, is this why no one finds bigfoot bones? and so on, also i'm having dreams about our future. i need to know what happened to me, out there that day. so i come to you for help.
content.summary: While looking for trespasser on property (hunters) came up on 3 types of different alien beings. i turned around and the next thing it was night time, i had missing time.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside to get the paper this morning at 6:15am and saw a bright white star moving across the sky about 5000ft and about as fast as a satellite moving from the north to the south. the light was as bright and the same size as venus which was in the eastern sky low on the horizon. i then noticed that there were two jets following it at about 6000ft on a parallel course one behind the other and about 5 seconds behind the light. i watched all three for about 30 seconds before they went behind some trees and lost sight of them. the light made no sound but i could hear the jets.
i first thought that the light was a jet from the san francisco airport with its landing lights on but when it moved past the point when the lights should not be seen it was still just as bright and brilliant.
content.summary: Bright white light moving from north to south

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving with my parents nw on hwy 183 between lampasas and brownwood between 7-8pm.  a little ways out of lampases, from the passenger seat, dad says "there's a ufo"...I laughed and just kept driving.  a little while later, i spotted 2 bright yellowish/orange lights (like about the size of a headlight from a mile or two away) in the night sky ahead of us and off to the north towards stephenville or comanche.  i jokingly said "there's your ufo's".  after a few seconds of us watching them just hang there at about a 45 degree angle from us in the sky, they were gone!  like a light being turned out.  i said "whoa, that was weird!" and kept searching the sky while trying to keep the vehicle on the road.

    by this time, mom was asking from the back seat what we were talking about because she couldn't see anything from back there.  as i kept driving,(maybe 5-10 min later) the lights appeared again, except this time there were more of them that i could see.  i saw a couple in front of me, and as i leaned in towards the stearing wheel, i could see 4 or 5 more off to the right (north).  dad and i were watching in amazement and pointing at them as mom tried to move around in the back seat so she could see.  a few seconds later, they were gone again, just like before.  this happened one more time, that i saw, before we got to brownwood.  if i wouldn't have been driving, i might have seen more.  dad, who had a better view from his side, kept saying he was seeing little blinking lights way up there moving around in the same area.  they were probably jet planes looking for whatever we were seeing in the sky.

    when we got to brownwood at about 8:00 p.M., we headed west on 67 towards san angelo.  another couple pulled up next to us at a stop light and rolled down their window and asked if we had seen the lights too.  (they said they wanted to make sure they weren't going crazy)  as we got halfway through town, we saw the lights again off to the nw towards abilene.  this time mom got a better view because they were lower, at about a 30 deg. angle.  it started out as what looked like one big light and then all of a sudden, as i said "hey look!", it just split off into about 7-10 slightly smaller ones that were aligned in a perfectly horizontal row and evenly spaced apart.  a few seconds later, they just vanished again like a light being turned off and that's the last time we saw them.  i mean i have seen lights in the sky before, but that was the craziest thing i've ever seen.  if i wouldn't have been driving, i would have tried to capture the images with my iphone.
content.summary: Bright lights in sky near brownwood / abilene  / stephenville tx

content.detailedDescription:
Out of this world
ufo reported in the dark early morning sky over greenup county
content.summary: Cigar shaped with red and green lights.  police involvement.

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were pulling into the driveway when she stopped and asked me if i could see the strange lights in the sky. sure enough there were strange flashy lights that appeared to be bouncy and extremely inconsistent. we called my father, who was riding his horse in our arena,  he could see them as well. my mother and i parked the car and ran to the arena to continue watching them. they would dissappear and reappear. just when the sky would be dark and we would think they were gone these bright orange lights would appear slowly first one, then a second one, a third, and then a fourth. these lights were compleyely still. sometimes they would be really close together, even over lapping, while other times they would be spaced out... at one point they were lined up in a. straight line. then they would completely dissappear again. the flashy, bouncy lights would reappear. when we first the lights they were really close but seemed to be moving west.  we are used to seeing planes and fighter jets and these lights were nothing of the sort. the movements were so inconsistent and sporatic.. its completely unxplainable. my mom reported our sighting and within 20 minutes there were fighter jets or similar air crafts flying near our property... but after they left the sporatic lights reappeared in the west and occasionally we would see the still bright orange lights. we called our friend lived not too far from us and he ccould see them too. we watched them for about an hour. i tried taking pictures but could not capture the lights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Multiple lights with sporatic flashing no consistency. would disapear and reappear. 4 bright orange lights would slowly appear and then disapear.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside about 9:00 at night and for some reason something made me look up.Then an object flew directly over my head.It was totally silent,no noise at all.It looked to be very large 2-3 hundred feet across.It looked like it but also looked like it was flying low or the size of it made it seem that way.It was triangle/boomerang shaped and the bottom was covered in dimmly lit lights that looked a dull reddish color.It was flying at a north to north west direction.I was only able to watch it for a few seconds 6-8 seconds.I imediatly came in and called my friend that lives north of town to see if he could see it.But the object was moving enough west to be out of his sight.To me it seemed like it was flying low.I watched one of your shows about 4 days ago.You animated a craft that someone else seen and it was almost exact to what i seen.I belive these to be some new kind of military craft.I konw what i seen.
content.summary: Object flew directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures in a pine forest in the wilderness of the stock, i wanted the background texture of pine trees through the fog and when it comes to my house to download the pictures i found these strange images. i do not think there is error in the photo because it was not raining.
content.summary: Strange object

content.detailedDescription: I was at going from the gas station to school with a friend when i saw a funny light in the sky. i pointed it out and we both freaked out about how strange it was, it was flying low to the ground and circling like a boomerang would, it was large and most likely sphere or disc shaped you could not really see the body of the craft because it was dark. on each side of the craft was one flashing light, around the middle of the craft were sequential lights that went around it.  it was circling near the school, no sound was audible, it then hovered approximately half a mile away, the lights dimmed out and i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Disc or sphere like. two flashing lights on ends, with sequential lights that went around the middle of the craft, circled , hovered low to ground and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: This is the third time i have seen this object. the first time was about an hour before sunset a few months ago. i was able to see what looked like a permanent contrail the same size of the object hovering in sky to the west of my location. it would move back and forth, but never closer or farther from me. the sun began to set & the clouds took over & i lost sight until night fell. i noticed the ball of light. it stayed in the sky for approx half an hour before i saw these planes (about 8) coming from every direction. the ufo never moved. i was able to see the ball of light & the light from these encircling aircrafts within close vacinity of each other. suddenly i didn't see the ufo ball of light anymore & then the other aircraft simply left in the same direction from which they came. the 2nd time i saw it, it was just simply there...Hovering. no chaser planes this time. on feb 10th, 2011...I saw it again. thank goodness my husband was outside with me at the time. he doesn't believe in ufos or any type of conspiracy theories. i told him to look to our west. he said it was a plane. i told him about the 1st experience i had in the same location. he said it looked like it was moving. i told him that we should come back in a half hour & that it would still be there. he looked at me like i was crazy. anyways, right before we went inside, the object disappeared. we never took our eyes off it. he looked at me in an unsettling manner & said that maybe they turned the lights off & turned his back towards me. we both began to laugh. he was spooked & i knew it. i was so excited that he was able to see it with his own eyes & that he had proof that i wasn't crazy. there is something strange going on in this area. my husband ssaid it may be military. i think i need to do some searching on the approx area. i haven't seen other article of someone experiencing this except for in tx...Which isn't really that far from my location. the 1st experience i had with this ufo, i did google to see if anyone else seen it. there was a sighting in lake charles, la...Which again isn't that far from where i am. i'm so glad for this site so that we can all share our experiences with each other. i would just like answers. military or no military...
content.summary: Strange ufo appears again

content.detailedDescription:
This seems to be a monthly occurrence and it just happened tonight.  in the late evening my wife and i will see one or two unusual amber/red lights between mt. jefferson and mt. hood in the oregon cascades.  the lights seem constant but flicker in intensity(on bright to on dim instead of on to off.)  if you were to draw a line between the two mountain peaks the lights would be in the middle, but about 5 miles to the east.  the lights typically hover above the forest for a couple minutes, slowly drift up for about 5 seconds and then fade away in about half a second.  from my house i can see these lights and using google earth estimate them to be about 40 miles away in wasco county.  the lights seem to be about 500-1000ft above the forest floor.  when they rise they probably reach an altitude of about 2000-3000ft before disappearing.  once i saw two of the lights at the same time and they were separated by maybe a mile.  sometimes there will be one light that appears and then disappears a few minutes later, to be followed by another light that does the same.

i���ll be the first to tell you that this is not some spectacular aerial display, but it is odd.  my friend claims to have been witness to this phenomena for nearly 20 years, in the same spot.  sometimes he sees it in the early morning and sometimes in the late evening.  the reasons i doubt this to be conventional aircraft are:  the color of the light is unusual, the light(s) sometimes bounce around in a way that would make a helicopter pilot sick, the lights remain stationary for long periods of time, the lights appear and then disappear in a way that conventional aircraft to not, the lights are seen over a seemingly uninteresting portion of a forest.

my wife has an aviation background and i���m an engineer.  we aren���t dummies, we just see weird things sometimes.
content.summary: Amber/red ball of light between mt. jefferson and mt. hood

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work, traveling on highway 377 from stephenville to dublin. i saw out of the corner of my eye some lights.. i thought it was the cell phone tower, realized that the tower was not there, it was on the opposite side of the highway.. about 1/2 mile or so back towards stephenville. i looked and saw 2 rows of lights. there were a total of 6 lights. these looked to be from the way  i had seen it about the size of volkswagen lights. they seemed to be rotating around something. whatever they were on was enormous!! as i reached for my cell phone to call my husband, by this time i had slowed down to about 30mph on the highway. i also noticed that the car beside me had slowed down as well. i called my husband and told him to go outside. then it was like the lights shut off, they did not fade or anything, not even get smaller, as if flying away. they just turned off!! then it was as if they seperated and there were more, my husband stayed on the phone w/me until i pulled into the driveway. we stood in our front yard and watched.There were random lights flying in all kinds of directions. one of them had a green light. i called my dad, who was in the marines for the majority of my life. i know that these were not f-18's flying in any sort of formation..For i grew up on a military base until i was 16. i am of sound mind, my father came to my house (he lives a couple of blocks from my house) he watched some of it w/us. then it these things, lights that seemed to have seperated and had gotten smaller got closer and took off.Not much longer we saw jets take off after them! it was the most amazing, and scary thing i have ever seen ever in my life! wow...We tried to record w/ our camcorder. i believe all we caught was one of the lights in the sky and the sound of the jets taking off after what is was we saw.
content.summary: Wow

content.detailedDescription:
Proof that ufos exist. i'll be uploading the rest of the pictures that i captured into a video format at the site i have my videos on the internet.  and before i downloaded the pictures to view them, i wrote this account first without seeing the pictures first.

  on february 10, 2011 in mesa, az around 2:30pm, i went outside onto my porch to watch the sky for a little bit.  i seen the normal things flying such as jets, birds, etc. then after a little while, i decided to lite a cigarette.  as i glanced towards the sky that was directly in front of me with just my eyes only and while liting the cigarette, i thought i seen what i thought was a small and bright ball of light high in the sky hovering and  less than half a mile from location which that sighting lasted just a few moments.  i quickly looked through the camera's telescopic lens to see if i could locate it thinking that maybe it was just a speck of dust or something that just briefly appear and disappeared.  i could not locate that ball of light, but i did take a few pictures of the general area of the sky anyways for me to later closely examine.

  then about 30 seconds to a minute later, i spotted a small and bright, white colored ufo that almost appeared similar to a small and brilliant star.  with 1 arm extended outward holding something to compare the size of the light or ufo, i would have to say the ufo was slightly smaller than a pea; or about the same size of a commercial jet seen flying at a 5 mile distant.  the area in the sky where i spotted this ufo was the same distant and same height of the first spotted object, but now this ufo was in a different part of the sky.  the first object was spotted at a compass bearing of 240 degrees.  the second sighting, the ufo was first seen  at a compass bearing of 200 degrees which is to my left side location.  from my perspectives, the ufo moved  a distant possibly 200 or 300 feet. the object was moving very slowly and flashing bright light from one side of the object slowly like a slow pulsating light that brighten and dim in irregular pattern.  the side that was lighting up was not facing the direction of the sun but north in direction.  when i first seen the 2nd ufo, it was moving to a distant of 100 feet like it was flying away from me at an angle heading south.  then the ufo changed its direction,  and it was then coming towards my location like a long curved course.  as it was coming towards my location, it appeared to become slightly larger, and it was then looking bright orange/yellow in color, and flashing very rapidly, yet  it also appeared like it was changing colors of orange and yellow somewhat similar to an old rotating/striped barber sign that was somewhat round or oval in shape.  after i had taken some pictures, i decided to change the camera exposure which when i did that, i temporary lost sight of the object when i tried locating it again.  i eventually located the object, only it had moved more to the right of my location a distant of 50 feet and much closer to my location.  i was actually thinking i was going to get some really good close up pictures of  this ufo if it  continued coming closer to my location. while taking some pictures of the ufo, i decided to use the auto-focus once which i had no problem using,  and i auto-focused onto the ufo; however, i didn't want to waste any time or chances using the auto-focus more than once.  i then decide later to switch back to my regular exposure which again i lost sight of the ufo temporarily which i eventually was able to locate the object again.  at that time, it was moving away from me like in an erratic flying pattern similar to moving up, down, and sideways jerking-like motion but at a slow speed.  after taking some pictures, i then decided to change the camera exposure setting again; however, after i did that, i could not locate the ufo in the sky.  beyond a doubt, it was a ufo of some sort,  and the ufo is absolutely not a balloon, plane, bird, star, etc;  100 percent plus ufo guarantee.

  while i continued to watch the sky in the general area where i once saw the ufo, 2 to 5 minutes later a small plane quickly flew passed my location very near me from the east at a low altitude and from behind my location.  the plane appeared to be at the same altitude i seen the ufo. the plane circled the general area once where i had previously seen the ufo.  after the plane circled the area just once, it headed then in a n or nw direction.  i also took lots of pictures of that plane.  when that plane circled around the general area of where i once spotted the ufo, it's circling the area indicated to me that the pilot must have seen the ufo too from a far distant, and he/she came to the area to check out the bright light.  i never seen a plane do a circle in the sky in my neighborhood, and the general area where the ufo was seen is also in the general section or  main flight path of commercial jets and small planes.

  the sky was blue, no clouds, crystal clear day, and mild sunrays. the wind seem to be blowing from the north very gently. the temperature was somewhere around 70 degrees.
content.summary: Bright, small ufo-- star-like at first, then strobe orange/yellow lights while moving very slowly high in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in passenger side of auto stopped at red light.  looked up through front windshield and saw one ob-long trail of orange light; which broke into 5 - 7 individual star-like objects.  i was puzzled at the site of orange lights in sky.  the objects dissapeared one by one.

this was the second incidence of seeing foreign objects in the sky within a  30 minute time-frame.  two people in another car, pulled up beside my auto as i arrived at early, tx; motioned for me to roll down the window and asked "did you see the lights in the sky back there?"  i answered "yes", and the woman passenger said "ok, great, now i know we aren't going crazy"!
content.summary: Stopped at traffic light & saw 5 to 7 bright  orange spots of light in sky north of brownwood, tx

content.detailedDescription: I went for a drive around lake leon tonight.  truthfully, i just had a hunch that i would see something tonight, and i did.  i was making a loop around the lake going south on ranch rd 2461 (i was at the southeast corner of the lake).  i was making the bend right before the road meets up with ranch rd 2214.  while taking that bend i saw the orange lights.  they were in the southern sky, were quite low in altitude and quite close.  there was a string of 4 or 5 orange lights in a row with two "stray" orange lights above and out to the sides of the main row.  the lights came on slowly, burned brightly then dimmed out.  the lights were in the same formation and behaved in exactly the same way as the lights i reported over eastland cemetery in november of 2008.  after the lights had disappeared i noticed a large swarm of military jets in the area.  their white strobes covered the sky, and they seemed to sweep the area farther south after the sighting towards de leon and eventually seemed to split up into pairs and sweep north.  immediately after the sighting, i stopped the car at the intersection of 2461 and 2214 and texted some friends who had seen the same type of ufo with me 11 months earlier over the nearby town of cisco.  one of my friends texted me back and said he was on his way to the nearby town of ranger (northeast of where i was). i told him to keep his eyes peeled.  a few minutes later at 7:50pm, he texted me and said he just saw two ufos.  a few minutes later at 7:52 he texted me again and said he saw the ufo again.  i texted him and told him that what i had seen was a row of orange lights like the ones we saw over cisco last year and asked if he was seeing the same thing.  he texted me back and said "yes" he was seeing the rows of orange lights like we had seen together over cisco.  later at 8:27pm he texted me stating he was seeing jets everywhere.  i have seen these same orange lights in eastland county for several years.  i'm curious about them but can never deduce anything about them except that they are arbitrary lights in the sky.  the lights always appear disembodied--no visible craft they appeared attached to, but seeing the lights in the similar rows of 4 or 5 with a few extra above makes me wonder if they aren't actually attached to a fixed-shaped craft that happens to be "cloaked" in some way.  the lights seem to hover or creep along at a snail's pace and are totally silent.  military jets always accompany the sightings.  one more thing.  i also have noticed that the sightings tend to occur when the moon is in its quarter phase (tonight is first quarter--this is what gave me my "hunch" that i would see something).  sorry, no footage.  again, event happens within a matter of seconds with no time to grab a camera.
content.summary: Row of orange lights again

content.detailedDescription: I was passenger in auto driving between mills and brown counties and glanced up to see two bright objects moving at the same speed across the sky. at first glance i thought of ufo's since they were climbing together at about a 20-degree angle; then both just dissapeared.  i was mistified at seeing such objects; however a few miles further i again caught sight of seven objects; ascending at about a 30-degree angle; and they two then dissappeared within a matter of seconds.
content.summary: Spotted two star-like objects at about a 25 degree angle in sky.  then in seconds they were gone

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting in my vehicle and noticed a bright glowing object in the sky south/west over dublin. i looked at the sphere and it disappeared, then a second one appeared just left of the where the first one disappeared. it glowed for about 5 to 10 seconds then it disappeared as well.
after it disappeared then i notice 5 or 6 of what i think are military jets right in the same area all in a very small area just where the spheres were.  within 30 seconds or so the jets (i can tell by their flashing lights) started dispersing in all different directions. then they all generally moved to the west for 30 to 60 seconds, then the all turned around and headed back east, all 5 seemed to group up again in a smaller area and all were traveling east. i watched another minute or two and never saw anything else except the jets, so i went on.

about 8 weeks ago my wife and i both saw 3 of these same gold/bronze spheres in the same exact locations.  they flashed on a off several times with up to 2 on at the same time. each time one would disappear then another, or the same one would reappear in a different location a couple of sphere widths to the side.  this lasted 30 seconds or so, after they quit then we saw the jets again but not in as a close pattern this time, more just searching.

approximately 1 year ago, i, my wife,my son and his wife all saw 3 or 4 of these same gold/bronze spheres in the s/w sky but we were at the west side of stephenville at the time.  that time they lasted about 1 minute, long enough for me to pull of the road into the wal mart parking lot and we all got out of the car to view them.
content.summary: 2 glowing gold/bronze spheres

content.detailedDescription: Upon arriving at home at approx 1900 hours i observed to the east of the city of deleon texas towards the city of dublin texas what appeared to be a single running light of an aircraft, but upon further observation i observed to more lights flashing in unison in a triangle pattern,the object was being followed by two aircraft which i perceived to be large jet powered aircraft,i observed the triangle craft and came to the conclusion it was massive in size compared to the two aircraft that were following,the triangle craft moved from north to south at a rapid pace, the two "chase" aircraft then broke off and headed west toward abilene texas,the triangle craft continued south and after approximately five minutes on this course the three corner running lights lite up red,the closest thing i can compare this to is afterburners or flames,the object was soon out off view and i could no longer observe,after the craft was out of view a third jet powered aircraft approached from the west from the abilene texas area and was on course to intercept the last area i saw the triangle shaped craft.During the time i observed the craft the hair on my neck was standing up and i could hear the neighborhood dogs barking and making more of a fuss than usual.
content.summary: Triangle w/ aircraft escort
